page.title: 04LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The neighbourhood office is for the community. It's there to sort out peoples problems. A place where anybody can pay rents and rates. Council tenants can get help with repairs or transfers. Bursts and general maintainance are also covered in the offices. Altogether there are 33 neighbourhood offices in Walsall. If you wish interviews can take place in private. About 6,000 peple use the Rushall office. 20% are pensioners. Inside four or five people work. Comupter links with the Town Hall are used. They also advertise what's happening in the local communities. Many offices have multi-lingual staffing.
